price: Sema: Mt'iini Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume. Na wakigeuka basi Mwenyezi Mungu hawapendi makafiri.
arabic: قُلۡ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: Sema: Mt'iini Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume. Na wakikukataa basi hao ni makafiri, wamemkataa Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume wake. Na Mwenyezi Mungu hawapendi makafiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul aṭīʿū al-laha wal-rasūla fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
